Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Exceptions
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Enum Constants
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.modelio.gproject.module.ModuleHandleComparator
    Does not work transitively. Fixing it would not be efficient.
    Use ModuleSorter to do a topological sort instead.

    This class is to be deleted as soon as possible.
  • Deprecated Exceptions 
    Exceptions and Description
    org.modelio.api.model.InvalidTransactionException
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.modelio.gproject.model.MModelServices.getModelFactory(IProjectFragment)
    org.modelio.gproject.model.IMModelServices.getModelFactory(IProjectFragment)
    use IMModelServices.getModelFactory()
    org.modelio.gproject.model.MModelServices.getModelFactory(MObject)
    org.modelio.gproject.model.IMModelServices.getModelFactory(MObject)
    use IMModelServices.getModelFactory()
    org.modelio.api.module.AbstractJavaModule.getModuleActions(ActionLocation)
    org.modelio.gproject.model.api.model.IModelTool.getSource(MObject)
    use ILinkTool
    org.modelio.gproject.model.api.model.IModelTool.getTarget(MObject)
    use ILinkTool
    org.modelio.vbasic.net.UriConnections.openInputStream(URI)
    Better use UriConnections.openInputStream(URI, IAuthData)
    org.modelio.gproject.gproject.GProjectFactory.openProject(ProjectDescriptor, IAuthData, IModuleCatalog, IModelioProgress)
    use GProjectFactory.openProject(ProjectDescriptor, IAuthData, IModuleCatalog, IProjectMonitor, IModelioProgress) that takes a IProjectMonitor.
    org.modelio.gproject.gproject.GProjectFactory.readDescriptor(Path)
    Use GProjectFactory.readProjectDirectory(Path).
    org.modelio.gproject.model.api.model.IModelTool.setSource(MObject, MObject, MObject)
    use ILinkTool
    org.modelio.gproject.model.api.model.IModelTool.setTarget(MObject, MObject, MObject)
    use ILinkTool
    org.modelio.gproject.gproject.ProjectWriter.write(GProject)
    use ProjectWriter.ProjectWriter(GProject) then ProjectWriter.writeProject().
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.modelio.gproject.gproject.ProjectWriter()
    Use ProjectWriter.ProjectWriter(GProject) instead
    org.modelio.vbasic.net.UriPathAccess(URI)
    Please use UriPathAccess.UriPathAccess(URI, IAuthData) with an authentication data or null if none is needed.
  • Deprecated Enum Constants 
    Enum Constant and Description
    org.modelio.vcore.smkernel.meta.smannotations.SmDirective.LOADALLINSTANCE
    don't use anymore
    org.modelio.vcore.smkernel.meta.smannotations.SmDirective.OBSOLETE
    : what's this?
    org.modelio.vcore.smkernel.meta.smannotations.SmDirective.SMCDMODIFYWITHDEP
    not used anymore I think.
    org.modelio.vcore.smkernel.meta.smannotations.SmDirective.SMCDPURSYM
    to be deleted
    org.modelio.vcore.smkernel.meta.smannotations.SmDirective.SYMETRIC
    to be deleted
